body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMart Customer Service. My name is Richard Stewart. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Richard, my name is Amber King.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amber. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited as I am considering making a return.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear that you're excited. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amber. Additionally, may I have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is amber.king@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Amber. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Richard.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Amber. Thank you for reaching out to CarMart Customer Service. Have a wonderful day!
